verbose_text: As mentioned above, various families of viruses belonging to Retroviridae (HIV-1 Vpu, HIV-2 Env, and SIV Nef), Filoviridae (EBOV GP), and Herpesviridae (KSHV K5/MIR2) respectively possess their own anti-BST2 factor that can antagonize BST2 through different molecular mechanisms of action.
evidence: anti-BST2 factor that can antagonize BST2
